name: Stronger Twogether
description:
Play as two characters at once as you make your way through three different lands. But make sure to stick twogether. Neither of your characters will be able to survive on their own. Please enjoy my first ever real game: Stronger Twogether!

Best experienced in fullscreen.

You should definitely play through the in-game tutorial, but it's a little wacky, so incase it doesn't work for you, here's how to play:

AWD or arrow keys to move

Spacebar to switch characters (Non-active character is invincable)

'Y' or 'Z' to pull the other character towards you

Blue: 'G' or 'X' to shoot

Green: 'G' or 'X' to glide, also can double jump

Big thanks to Kenny.nl for providing every bit of art in this game!
